original_text: The angel of the Lord found her by a spring of water in the wilderness, the spring on the way to Shur.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 광야의 샘물 곁 곧 술 길 샘 곁에서 그를 만나

sentences.original_text: The angel of the Lord found her.
She was by a spring of water.
The spring was in the wilderness.
It was on the way to Shur.
